etymology.description: 纯素 + 食者 = person who eats an entirely plant-based diet (vegan).
etymology.interpretation: Emphasizes a strictly plant-based diet with no animal-derived products. 者 is a nominalizer meaning “person.”
etymology.simplification: 純 was simplified to 纯 by reducing the 糸 radical to 纟 and simplifying the rest; other characters are unchanged.

parts.english: purely vegetarian; vegan; entirely plant-based; strict vegetarian
eater; one who eats; food consumer; person (suffix)

examples.chinese: 很多纯素食者不吃任何动物产品(很多純素食者不吃任何動物產品)。
examples.pinyin: Hěn duō chún sù shí zhě bù chī rènhé dòngwù chǎnpǐn.
examples.english: Many vegans don't eat any animal products.

examples.chinese: 她是严格的纯素食者，只吃蔬菜、水果和谷物(她是嚴格的純素食者，只吃蔬菜、水果和穀物)。
examples.pinyin: Tā shì yángé de chún sù shí zhě, zhǐ chī shūcài, shuǐguǒ hé gǔwù.
examples.english: She is a strict vegan and only eats vegetables, fruit, and grains.

examples.chinese: 为了环境和健康，越来越多的人成为纯素食者(為了環境和健康，越來越多的人成為純素食者)。
examples.pinyin: Wèile huánjìng hé jiànkāng, yuèláiyuè duō de rén chéngwéi chún sù shí zhě.
examples.english: For the environment and health, more and more people are becoming vegans.
